title: Forever James Dean
brief_description: A short documentary about the short career of screen legend James Dean. Features loads of stills, his first screen appearance for ‘Pepsi’ and clips and trailers of his three feature films: “East of Eden”, “Rebel without a cause” and “Giant”. Contains some contemporary interviews and features a song written for the film made in the 1980s. Narrated by Bob Gunton.
